data.comment: The match is underway in Swansea.
Jamal Lowe puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 28, Jack Walton (Barnsley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The first-half is over at Liberty Stadium.
The second-half is underway in Swansea.
In the minute 57, Victor Adeboyejo is replacing Cauley Woodrow for Barnsley at Liberty Stadium.
The away team have replaced Dominik Frieser with George Miller. This is the second substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
Valerien Ismael (Barnsley) is making a third substitution, with Luke Thomas replacing Conor Chaplin.
In the minute 66, Own goal in Swansea! Victor Adeboyejo scores in his own net to make it 2-0.
Romal Palmer is on a sub for Matty James for Barnsley.
Barnsley make their fifth substitution with Herbie Kane replacing Alex Mowatt.
Andy Davies blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Connor Roberts (Swansea) has received a first yellow card.
